parameters.name: x
parameters.desc: Independent variables: A list of variables from database. The variable should be Real, Integer or String. The variable can be either numerical or categorical. It cannot be empty

parameters.name: y
parameters.desc: Dependent variable: A variable form database. The variable should be Real, Integer or String. It should be categorical. It cannot be empty

parameters.name: iterationNumber
parameters.desc: The iterationNumber shows the id of the testing dataset.

parameters.name: pathology
parameters.desc: The name of the pathology that the dataset belongs to.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.desc: It contains the names of one or more datasets, in which the algorithm will be executed. It cannot be empty.
